text: Brandon McDonald Williams (born May 22, 1967) is an American politician, farmer, and businessman. He was the U.S. representative for New York's 22nd congressional district from 2023 to 2025. He is a member of the Republican Party. On August 22, 2023, Williams announced that he was running for a second term in 2024. He lost the November 5, 2024, election to Democratic state Senator John Mannion. On January 16, 2025, President-elect Donald Trump nominated Williams to be the next Under Secretary for Nuclear Security. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Brandon Williams official U.S. House website * Brandon Williams for Congress * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Dallas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from Dallas Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Politicians from Syracuse, New York
title: Brandon Williams (politician)
